mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (P_NO, P_NAME, P_INPUT, P_OUTPUT, EXPIRATION, REG_DATE, CATEGORY_NO, SALE, P_PRICE) VALUES (PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pName}, #{pInput}, #{pOutput}, #{expiration}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{categoryNo}, #{sale}, #{pPrice})

INSERT INTO PRODUCT_DETAIL (P_NO, IMG_MAIN, IMG_COOK, IMG_COMPONENT, P_COMPONENT, COOK, CONTENT, CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (#{pNo}, #{imgMain}, #{imgCook}, #{imgComponent}, #{pComponent}, #{cook}, #{content}, #{categoryNo})
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_IMAGE (IMAGE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_RENAME, FILE_PATH, P_NO) VALUES (PRODUCT_IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{fileName}, #{fileRename}, #{filePath}, #{pNo})
mapper.select: SELECT p.P_NO, p.P_NAME, p.P_INPUT, p.P_OUTPUT, p.EXPIRATION, p.REG_DATE, p.CATEGORY_NO, p.SALE, p.P_PRICE, pd.IMG_MAIN, pd.IMG_COOK, pd.IMG_COMPONENT, pd.P_COMPONENT, pd.COOK, pd.CONTENT FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_DETAIL pd ON p.P_NO = pd.P_NO WHERE p.P_NO = #{pNo}
